info.name: REST API for Oracle Identity Cloud Service

request.description: Provides a list of allowed HTTP methods for the resource in the Access-Control-Allow-Methods header.
Provides a list of allowed HTTP methods for the resource in the Access-Control-Allow-Methods header.

body.raw:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Confidential Client Application",
  "description": "Confidential client application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "confidential",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code","client_credentials","password","refresh_token","urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.myapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/"]
}

request.description: Create a client application

body.raw:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Resource Server Application",
  "description": "Resource Server application for testing purposes",
  "isOAuthResource": true,
  "accessTokenExpiry": 3600,
  "refreshTokenExpiry": 604800,
  "allUrlSchemesAllowed": false,
  "audience": "https://api.rserver.com",
  "scopes": [
    {
      "value": "/mysettings",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/mysettings",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Get information about your preferences"
    },{
      "value": "/post",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/post",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Post on your behalf"
    },{
      "value": "/myprofile",
      "fqs": "https://api.rserver.com/myprofile",
      "requiresConsent": false,
      "description": "Access your profile information"
    }]
}

request.description: Create a resource server app

item.name: Create a client and resource server app

body.raw:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Client and Resource Server",
  "description": "Client and Resource server application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "confidential",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code","client_credentials"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.mytestapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.mytestapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.mytestapp.com/"],
  "isOAuthResource": true,
  "accessTokenExpiry": 3600,
  "refreshTokenExpiry": 604800,
  "allUrlSchemesAllowed": false,
  "audience": "https://api.mytestapp.com",
  "scopes": [
    {
      "value": "/mysettings",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/mysettings",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Get information about your preferences"
    },{
      "value": "/post",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/post",
      "requiresConsent": true,
      "description": "Post on your behalf"
    },{
      "value": "/myprofile",
      "fqs": "https://api.mytestapp.com/myprofile",
      "requiresConsent": false,
      "description": "Access your profile information"
    }]
}

request.description: Create a client and resource server application

body.raw:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomWebAppTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test SAML Application",
  "description": "SAML application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "trusted",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code","client_credentials","password","refresh_token","urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.myapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/"]
}

request.description:
An OAuth client application is an HTTP client that can acquire, and then use an access token. There are three types of OAuth client applications that you can create: Confidential, Trusted, and Public. Both the confidential and trusted client apps are specified by using CustomWebAppTemplateId as the value for the basedOnTemplate attribute. 

Note: If you are using the optional name attribute in your request, be sure to use only alphanumeric characters and the underscore ( _ ) character in the value.

body.raw:
{
  "schemas": ["urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:oracle:idcs:App"],
  "basedOnTemplate": { "value": "CustomBrowserMobileTemplateId" },
  "displayName": "Test Public Client Application",
  "description": "Public client application for testing purposes",
  "clientType": "public",
  "isOAuthClient": true,
  "allowedGrants": ["authorization_code","implicit"],
  "redirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/callback"],
  "logoutUri": "https://www.myapp.com/logout",
  "postLogoutRedirectUris": ["https://www.myapp.com/"]
}

request.description:
An OAuth client application is an HTTP client that can acquire, and then use an access token. There are three types of OAuth client applications that you can create: Confidential, Trusted, and Public.

The public client app is specified by using CustomBrowserMobileTemplateId as the value for the basedOnTemplate attribute.
